name: STAR WARS Battle of Kamino (Gunfight)
description:
If you like STAR WARS The Clone Wars or just Star Wars, then this Game is for you Play as a Clone Trooper and fight for your home planet Kamino or play as a battle droid and invade Kamino (This is a Fan Star Wars Themed Gunfight game)

Character art art inspired from

Star Wars Episode 3: Revenge of the Sith on the Game boy advanced

Background and other art done by me 

Music from Lego Star Wars the Complete saga

Controlls

Player1 aka Battle droid 

w=walk up    s=down    d=right    a=left

q=look up       e=look down

3=when near crate =cover

2=when down stand up in cover

spacebar= Shoot

Player2 aka Clone Trooper (HAVE NUMLOCK ON)

Num1=left      Num2-Down      Num3=Right   Num5=up

Num4=look down     Num5=Look Up

Num 8=when near crate =cover

Num7=when down stand up in cover

Down Arrow= Shoot
